title: Create Pod with Restart Policy
description: Create a Pod named ||restart-pod|| using image ||busybox:1.31.0|| with restart policy ||Never|| and command ||'echo hello && exit 1'|| in the ||neptune|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get pod restart-pod -n neptune -o jsonpath='{.spec.restartPolicy}'
validations.description: Pod should have Never restart policy
